title: #304 - Leon Trotsky Part 3: Downfall, Exile, and Death
itunes:title: #304 - Leon Trotsky Part 3: Downfall, Exile, and Death
description: All things must come to an end, including the brief saga of Leon Trotsky. The once central figure of a global revolution finds himself far from home and with very few friends. But Connor and Dan learn that, much like the other socialists of his ilk, Trotsky wasn't going down without a fight.
